CustomField.description: Probability-weighted ACV for AI-Enabled opportunities only. Uses Net ACV for existing customers (Prior Opp ACV > 0). Only returns positive values.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Eudia_Tech__c, IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) > 0 ), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) * IF(Probability_Override__c, Custom_Probability_Value__c, Calculated_Probability__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: Weighted ACV (AI-Enabled)
